segments.text: Ugh, that sink is a disgusting flood zone now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pouring everywhere, soaking the cabinets and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot in the puddle—gross, she must feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she's still drying dishes like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids grabbing cookies from the jar, hands all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting; they'll make even more mess if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching in too—filthy fingers in the treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overflowing water mixed with who knows what on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen's turning into a swamp.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden view can't hide the sloppiness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such a waste and dirt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to clean this up immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR
